collection.srdc_docs: Doc ID 1935743.1: SRDC - Diagnostic Collection for DataPump Export Performance Issues.

commands.script:
REM srdc_expdpperf_object_metadata.sql set pagesize 200 verify off term off entmap off echo off set markup html on spool on COLUMN SRDCSPOOLNAME NOPRINT NEW_VALUE SRDCSPOOLNAME select 'SRDC_'||upper('OBJECT_METADATA')||'_'||upper(instance_name)||'_'|| to_char(sysdate,'YYYYMMDD_HH24MISS') SRDCSPOOLNAME from v$instance; spool SRDC_EXPDPPERF_%OBJECT_TYPE%_%SCHEMA_NAME%_%OBJECT_NAME%.htm set long 100000 select owner, object_type, data_object_id from dba_objects where object_name = upper('%OBJECT_NAME%'); select dbms_metadata.get_ddl (upper('%OBJECT_TYPE%'), upper('%OBJECT_NAME%'), upper('%SCHEMA_NAME%')) from dual;
spool off set markup html off spool off set term on set echo off set verify on set echo on
